title: 11 million locked down in China's Hebei province to prevent spread of new coronavirus outbreak
content:
1. 11 million locked down in China's Hebei province to prevent spread of new coronavirus outbreak  NBC News
  2. China tightens COVID-19 restrictions near Beijing  Al Jazeera English
  3. Beijing shuts religious venues as coronavirus spreads in Hebei  South China Morning Post
  4. Local farmers market delivers food to China's Shijiazhuang residents  CGTN America
  5. Virus-hit Hebei capital stays calm in de-facto lockdown  Global Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
